clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Study in Patients Who Underwent an Haploidentical Transplantation With T-repleted Bone Marrow
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective-prospective Observational Study for Data Collection of Patients Who Underwent an Haploidentical Transplantation After Non-myeloablative Conditioning Regimen

brief_summary.textblock: Outcome evaluation in patients who underwent transplantation with T-repleted bone marrow after post-transplantation cyclophosphamide

detailed_description.textblock: Patients who underwent transplantation with T-repleted bone marrow haploidentical transplantation will be analyzed considering toxicity incidence (GVHD, infective complications, graft-failure incidence and TRM)and efficacy variables (Overall Survival, Progression Free Survival and Relapse incidence)

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective

primary_outcome.description: Chronic and acute GVHD, infectious complications, graft failure, TRM

arm_group.description: T-repleted haploidentical transplanted patients in Italy

study_pop.textblock: patients who underwent a haploidentical transplantion after non-myeloablative conditioning regimen

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients affected by hematologic neoplasia who underwent a haploidentical transplantation (2-3 mismatches) from a familiar donor, with non-ex vivo manipulated bone marrow and post-transplantation cyclophosphamide
Exclusion Criteria:
- ex vivo manipulated bone marrow transplantation
- use of antilymphocyte serum during conditioning
